work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Oversaw all phases of product development cycle.
work.point0: Programming languages: JAVA, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, MySQL, Communication protocol: TCP/IP - Effectively designed, analyzed, and implemented client/server program.
work.point1: Enhanced product performance by feature addition and defect remediation to provide highest level of quality.
work.point2: Developed, maintained, and supported host server-side code, enabling Atmiya and client application to access services.
work.point3: Integrated IR sensor with software and stored the collected data to MySQL database.
work.point4: Performed unit, regression and functional testing on all code and fixed all problems during testing and validated results.
work.point5: Provided debugging information to developers by verifying code correctness prior to release.
